headline: Nexcent â€“ The Minimal SaaS Landing Page
shortDescription: A clean, modern, and fully responsive template built with Vite.js and Tailwind CSS. Perfect for SaaS startups and agencies ready to launch fast.
overview: Nexcent is a clean, modern, and fully responsive single-page landing page template built with vanilla Vite.js, Tailwind CSS, and minimal JavaScript. Designed for SaaS startups, marketing agencies, and small businesses that need a professional, lightweight, and fast-loading online presence without complex frameworks.
whyChoose: Lightweight & Fast â€“ Built with Vite.js for blazing fast development and optimized builds.
Responsive Design â€“ Looks perfect on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Easy to Customize â€“ Semantic Tailwind CSS utility classes and custom config for colors, fonts, and layouts.
SEO Friendly â€“ Semantic HTML, headings, meta tags, and fast load times.
Minimal JavaScript â€“ Only essential scripts to keep the experience smooth.

customization.intro: Nexcent uses Tailwind CSS with a custom configuration for colors, fonts, and layout.
highlights: Container is centered with responsive max-widths: sm (100%), md (768px), lg (1000px), xl (1200px).
Custom neutral and primary color palette.
Semantic font sizes: headline-1, body-1, etc.

shortDescription: A vibrant, modern, and fully responsive sneaker collectibles template built with Vite.js and Tailwind CSS. Perfect for sneaker marketplaces, collectible platforms, and e-commerce startups ready to launch fast.
overview: Collers is a dynamic, professional, and fully responsive collectible sneakers marketplace landing page template crafted with modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
